caption: Nicolas Guy Brenet (French, 1728–1792), formerly attributed to Jacques-Louis David (1748–1825; born Paris, France; died Brussels, Belgium; active Paris, Brussels, and Rome, Italy), Pericles and Anaxagoras, late 18th century. Oil on canvas; 65 x 81.5 cm, 79 × 96 × 4 cm (frame). Museum purchase (y1930-438)
